message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you consider that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $120, but I'm still a bit hesitant to sell at that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $160. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $140. Can you consider that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $140, but I'm still not willing to sell at that price. I'm willing to compromise again and offer $155. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise again. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $145. Can you consider that price?

Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $145, but I'm still not willing to sell at that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer $152. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $142. Can you consider that price?

Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $142, but I'm still not willing to sell at that price. I'm getting close to considering other offers, but I'll make one more compromise and offer $148. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise. However, I'm getting close to my budget and I'm not sure if I can go any higher. I'm willing to go up to $147. Can you consider that price?
